Full Description: Braintrust offers an AI stack to simplify the process from evaluations to data management, ensuring seamless integration into any business. Braintrust simplifies the evaluation process by facilitating easy scoring, logging, and visualization of outputs. Users can investigate failures, monitor performance trends, and address queries like identifying regressions or assessing new models.  The platform offers a Prompt Playground, allowing users to compare multiple prompts, benchmarks, and input/output pairs across runs, enabling both ephemeral tinkering and experiment evaluation on large datasets.  In Continuous Integration, Braintrust seamlessly integrates into workflows, enabling progress tracking on the main branch and automatic comparison of new experiments with live versions before deployment.  With a focus on Datasets, the platform enables the effortless capture of rated examples from staging and production, incorporating them into versioned "golden" datasets stored in the cloud. This ensures the evolution of datasets without jeopardizing evaluations dependent on them.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Generative AI, Industrial Automation, Marketing Automation, Sales Automation, Software
Description: SAAS, Mobile App, AI, Automation
Top 5 Investors: VCI Global
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Manufacturing, Sales and Marketing, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Marvis is building the AI workforce for modern business. Our flagship product, Lumexa, is an AI agent that learns to automate any repetitive task on a PC by simply watching a user perform it once. Problem Every year, businesses lose trillions of dollars and millions of human hours to digital busywork—the repetitive, mundane tasks that drain creativity and stifle growth. Despite an explosion in software tools, teams are more burdened than ever by manual data entry, cross-app reporting, and routine administrative cycles. Existing automation solutions are either too complex and expensive (legacy RPA) or too limited (API-based tools) to solve the problem for the vast majority of modern, agile businesses. Market This "productivity paradox" is most acute for the millions of solo founders, small teams, and agile SaaS companies that form the backbone of the new economy. For them, operational drag isn't just an annoyance; it's a critical bottleneck. They lack the dedicated IT departments and deep technical expertise required to deploy traditional automation, leaving their most valuable team members—including the founders themselves—trapped in work they hate. This represents a massive, underserved market hungry for a new solution. Solution Introducing Lumexa, from Marvis—an AI teammate you train as you would a new employee. Lumexa learns by watching. Simply perform a task on your PC once, and our AI agent learns the workflow, from simple copy-pasting to complex, multi-app processes. It then executes that task flawlessly and securely, whenever you need it. This is not another brittle RPA or a limited low-code platform. Lumexa is a new generation of AI that: Learns Visually: No coding, no complex flowcharts. If you can do the task, you can teach Lumexa. "See. Learn. Done." Is Hyper-Personalized: It automates your unique workflows across your specific stack of desktop and web applications. Delivers Instant Value: Beta users are already saving 15+ hours per week, reclaiming critical time to focus on product development, customer engagement, and strategic growth. Marvis is giving teams their most valuable resource back: time. With Lumexa, we empower businesses to achieve a new level of operational efficiency. Lumexa is currently in an exclusive free beta from Marvis, onboarding innovative SaaS companies and small businesses daily. We are building the operating system for a new era of human-machine collaboration, empowering teams to achieve unprecedented levels of productivity.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Software
Description: Infrastructure to build, manage & run useful autonomous AI agents
Top 5 Investors: Kae Capital, Newlands VC
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: Open-source framework for developers designed to Build, deploy, and manage Autonomous AI Agents. Features include: - Agent provisioning and execution offer the ability to run multiple agents concurrently for maximum efficiency. Developers can expand these agents' capabilities by using a growing library of tools or by creating custom tools tailored to their needs. - The platform includes a graphical user interface (GUI) for easy management and interaction with agents. For direct input and permissions management, an action console is provided. SuperAGI supports multiple Vector DB connections, which improves agent performance and data access. - Create multi-model agents that can be tailored to specific tasks. This is enhanced further by agent trajectory fine-tuning, in which agents learn and optimise their performance via feedback loops. - Performance telemetry provides useful insights into agent performance, allowing for optimisation and improvement. The platform also emphasises effective token management, balancing the costs associated with its use. - SuperAGI enables agents to store their experiences, thereby facilitating continuous learning and adaptation. To prevent looping issues, it employs looping detection heuristics that notify developers when an agent is stuck, enabling proactive resolution. - A resource manager is included for the handling of files generated by agents, ensuring efficient data management and analysis.

Full Description: Uncensored AI is an artificial intelligence company designed to operate with minimal content restrictions, offering responses without the heavy moderation typical of mainstream models. Unlike traditional AIs that are fine-tuned with strict guidelines to prevent the generation of sensitive or harmful content, Uncensored AI aims to deliver unfiltered, raw output. This approach is intended to foster more open dialogues, facilitate honest brainstorming, and provide access to a broader spectrum of information. With the latest advancements in artificial intelligence and Uncensored AI, users can now bypass the "sugar coating" that often limits genuine interaction with digital tools. By removing many of the pre-programmed guardrails, Uncensored AI promises an experience that is liberating. Looking ahead, Uncensored AI is preparing to launch their own API, introduce next-generation Nix Agents capable of performing a wide range of tasks for users, and implement end-to-end encryption offerings across its B2C chatbot and B2B solutions, further expanding its utility, privacy, and scalability.

Full Description: Logically.app (formerly Afforai) is an award winning, all-in-one workspace for collaborative researching and writing. Many institutions worldwide have partnered with Logically to provide their students and researchers with an easy-to-use platform to manage references, conduct literature reviews, annotate files, take notes, and write papers. Logically is used globally by over 100,000 students, faculty, and researchers, including many at leading universities. With Logically, many institutions and organizations can: Allow students, faculty, and staff access to Logically Document Writer, for collaborative scientific writing. Logically offers single-click citations, automatic bibliographies, and support for LaTeX, tables, code blocks, and more. This would help institutions save costs by replacing tools like Microsoft Word, Google Docs, Overleaf, etc. Provide students, faculty, and staff access to Logically Reference Manager, where they can organize and manage their references as they write papers. This would help institutions save costs by replacing tools like Zotero, Mendeley, and EndNote with Logically. Allow researchers to read and annotate their papers in Logically File Annotator, which would significantly accelerate their reading and literature review process, replacing more expensive tools like Adobe Acrobat. Let researchers access Logically Research Assistant, an AI-powered scientific tool to help conduct efficient, citation-backed literature reviews while maintaining academic integrity. This replaces less specialized tools such as ChatGPT or Gemini. Here is an example of a university partnering with Logically to provide access to better learning while tremendously saving costs: https://afforai.com/nau

Industries: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Cyber Security
Description: Building an AI-powered code scanner to stop PII data leaks at the source and automate data mapping for compliance.
Top 5 Investors: E14 Fund, Page One Ventures, Ex/Ante, Mozilla Ventures, Amjad Masad
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data and Analytics, Information Technology, Privacy and Security, Science and Engineering, Software
Full Description: HoundDog.ai provides a much-needed lens into PII data handling and third-party data flows early in development, minimizing costly and disruptive remediation efforts if violations are discovered in production. Our static code scanner prevents PII leaks during development (before code is pushed to production) and fully automates compliance tasks for teams struggling to keep pace with development speed. HoundDog.ai focuses on preventing unintentional developer errors, such as oversharing or overlogging PII, before code reaches production. Our mission is to support the "Assume Breach" security mindset by creating a world where, even if attackers breach the wall, they find nothing valuable to steal. The platform is trusted by leading Fortune 500 companies in healthcare and finance. Key Features: PII Leak Vulnerability Detection: Proactively identify and address vulnerabilities where sensitive data (e.g., PII, PHI, and CHD) is exposed in plaintext through logs, files, tokens, cookies, or third-party systems (overlooked by SAST scanners). Compliance Automation: Automated Data Mapping: Know exactly where PII is handled within your codebases. Reporting & Data Flow Visualization: Continuously track and visualize sensitive data flows across storage mediums and third-party integrations, effortlessly generating Records of Processing Activities (RoPA) reports. Stay Ahead of Compliance Violations: Detect data processing agreement (DPA) breaches caused by overshared PII with third-party integrations before production.

Full Description: SolarPulse is pioneering the transformation of the solar energy sector with its state-of-the-art AI-powered platform, focused on predictive maintenance and optimization of solar PV plants. Established in 2023, SolarPulse brings together cutting-edge analytics and IoT technologies to deliver real-time insights that significantly boost the efficiency and reliability of solar energy systems. The company’s flagship products, HelioCloud and HelioHealth, offer real-time analytics software and IoT sensors that provide panel-level diagnostics. These innovations empower solar operators to identify and address potential issues before they become costly, thereby minimizing downtime and enhancing overall system performance. SolarPulse's solutions are built on a deep understanding of both solar technology and AI, enabling it to offer precise diagnostics and actionable recommendations that drive significant performance improvements. By integrating its technology with existing SCADA and CMS platforms, SolarPulse helps solar companies transition from reactive to proactive maintenance strategies, ensuring that their assets are optimized for long-term operation. The platform also includes climate risk assessment tools that forecast long-term solar irradiance and wind speed, further helping investors and developers make informed decisions.

Our platform provides the intelligence and resources needed to mobilize capital and multi-sector innovation to address the world's most pressing challenges. In this decisive decade, addressing complex societal challenges requires changing essential underlying systems—such as food, energy, mobility, healthcare, education, and finance—that are causing and worsening these challenges. Capital must target changing these systems for triggering long-lasting structural impacts. This shift demands moving from an SDG-flagging, project-by-project mentality to a systemic paradigm that mobilizes multi-sector collaboration, funding industry, academia and civil society for synergistic action. This transition requires higher intelligence for decision-making that Mútua is building. Our comprehensive data intelligence tool allows investors to make informed decisions that support critical innovations for long-lasting societal impact. By enabling the strategic deployment of capital to the root causes of societal challenges in essential systems, we foster transformative solutions. Our solution enables the definition of transformative investment strategies, AI-powered mission-aligned deal origination, and streamlined deal qualification. At the same time, we offer mission-driven innovators an effective fundraising tool and support for becoming investment-ready. By connecting them with mission-aligned investors and partners, we help innovators scale their solutions and achieve their goals. We join the movement for creating a new regenerative and distributive economy that addresses social needs within planetary boundaries. By fostering a synergistic approach to investment, Mútua envisions a future where societal challenges are met with coordinated, impactful solutions that drive systemic change.

It's the research OS for knowledge-driven teams. Sharly is clarity, at scale.

Our platform organizes intangible assets in a structured system, providing AI-powered insights, portfolio-wide reporting, and enterprise-grade security to ensure businesses fully understand what they own and how it drives growth. Our Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) AI extracts key insights from scattered IP data, while blockchain tracking ensures transparency and protection. With a fast-growing market and rising concerns about IP security, businesses need a modern, intelligence-driven solution. Big Idea gives executives and IP teams real-time clarity, helping them protect, manage, and monetize their most strategic assets. The future of IP isn’t just about legal management—it’s about intelligent decision-making, and Big Idea is leading the way.

Industries: Business Process Automation (BPA), Generative AI, Marketing Automation, Sales Automation
Description: Link AI tools together with a drag-and-drop UI. Incorporating agentic AI tech and growing through segmentation vertical by vertical.
Top 5 Investors: Haatch
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Information Technology, Sales and Marketing, Software
Full Description: doFlo is a human-first AI workflow automation platform designed to replace tools, not people. By combining an intuitive drag-and-drop, no-code interface with powerful AI automation, doFlo empowers businesses to streamline processes while keeping humans in control. Inspired by process-mapping tools like Lucidchart, the platform turns simple annotations into fully functional automations, bridging the gap between AI’s vast potential and real-world usability. Unlike traditional workflow automation tools, doFlo is reliable, scalable, and built for real adoption, ensuring that AI enhances human productivity rather than replacing it. The demand for AI-powered automation is skyrocketing, but existing solutions are either too complex or too rigid to meet real business needs. doFlo was built to solve this problem by making AI workflows easy, accessible, and adaptable—starting with real estate and expanding into other industries. With 2,500+ integrations and proprietary AI models, the platform enables professionals to automate multi-step tasks without technical expertise, delivering efficiency while maintaining full transparency and data control at every step. AI workflows are just the beginning. The next seismic shift in automation is Agentic AI—AI systems that not only execute tasks but also learn, adapt, and act autonomously. doFlo is strategically positioning itself to lead this evolution, incorporating AI agent capabilities as market demand matures. This includes integrating LLM-powered decision-making, capturing rich meta-data for continuous learning, and expanding autonomous action capabilities. While many automation companies struggle to pivot toward AI agents due to legacy constraints, doFlo was built from the ground up to evolve alongside AI advancements. Founded by William Butler (CEO) and Thomas Maarseveen (CTO), doFlo is backed by a team with a proven track record in gaming, hardware, consumer, SaaS, and AI-driven businesses. Over 14 years, they’ve successfully launched and scaled multiple ventures, including an online gaming company that reached millions in ARR, and a cybersecurity startup acquired by Gen (formerly Avast) in a Fortune 500 exit. Their experience in building and scaling technology companies positions doFlo as a leader in the next wave of AI-powered automation. At its core, doFlo is driven by a simple belief: automation should empower people, not replace them. By eliminating repetitive tasks, businesses can unlock human creativity, deepen connections, and drive real innovation. As AI continues to evolve, doFlo is committed to ensuring it remains a force for good, creating technology that enhances human potential rather than diminishing it.

Full Description: Supply Pay is a software company that aims to streamline the global supply chain with insightful products & services. To date we have launched two products Supply Pay & Supply Link. Supply Pay, launched in January 2024, has achieved PMF by solving the pain point of long cashflow conversion cycles found in cross-border trade. Specifically, we target agricultural trade between U.S. & MX.  By maintaining a lean approach, were able to break even ~6 months into launching this initial product. The learnings we found through building, launching, and now scaling Supply Pay led us to some unique insights. Our insights fostered a strong conviction to build Supply Link. Supply Link launched in February 2025 and is now being tested with early customers. Our latest product aims to solve the communication fragmentation found in the movement of cross-border goods and automates the complex workflows associated with all stakeholders involved in cross-border trade. These stakeholders include suppliers, buyers, customs brokers, carriers, and federal agencies—initially we are focused on U.S. & MX parties.

We work with regulated companies that use nature in industries like agriculture, consumer goods, petroleum and pharmaceuticals AND with environmental stewards like governments and NGOs to help them easily turn eDNA into action. By combining eDNA with geospatial data and overlaying AI algorithms, we can answer questions about biodiversity health, track progress across metrics, and create predictions to inform decisions across ecososytems around the world.

Description: Gen AI Personal Shopping Assistant
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Clothing and Apparel, Commerce and Shopping, Design, Internet Services
Full Description: Finding the perfect product online can be a daunting task. With millions of options spread across countless e-commerce platforms, users often spend hours sifting through pages, searching for something that matches their preferences, style, and budget. This time-consuming and frustrating process leaves many shoppers overwhelmed and dissatisfied. That’s where Drezily comes in—a revolutionary shopping platform designed to transform your online shopping journey into an effortless and enjoyable experience. Drezily is not just another e-commerce platform; it’s your AI-powered shopping assistant in a true sense. Built with advanced Gen AI technology, Drezily eliminates the need for endless scrolling and endless tabs with its multimodal search capabilities and by understanding your unique preferences, Drezily is able to  deliver  highly personalized recommendations in seconds. Whether you’re shopping for clothes, accessories, or anything in between, Drezily helps you discover products that align perfectly with your taste. Why Choose Drezily? Drezily sets itself apart with features that redefine how you shop online: Advanced Search Capabilities: With semantic and image search, Drezily simplifies the product discovery process. You can upload an image, describe your desired product, or simply chat with the platform to receive tailored results instantly. Using state-of-the-art computer vision technology, Drezily finds exact or similar items across multiple stores online. Hyper-Personalized Recommendations: Unlike traditional platforms that rely on basic tags, Drezily goes deeper. Each product is categorized with over 400 attributes, such as style, fabric, fit, and color. This attention to detail ensures that the recommendations you receive are not only accurate but also resonate with your unique style preferences. Adaptive Learning: Drezily evolves with you. The platform learns from your interactions, understanding your preferences better with every search. From favorite styles to preferred colors and fabrics, Drezily remembers the details that matter most to you, ensuring a truly personalized shopping experience every time. Effortless Shopping in Seconds: Shopping with Drezily is fast and intuitive. No more browsing through countless sites—Drezily does the hard work for you, delivering results from multiple stores in one convenient place. How Drezily Benefits Shoppers? Every month, millions of shoppers in the U.S. spend countless hours searching for the right products online. This overwhelming process often leaves users frustrated, with most users struggling to find the perfect item at the right price. Drezily solves this problem by leveraging AI to streamline and personalize your shopping experience. Imagine simply snapping a picture of an item you love or describing it in a chat—Drezily’s AI technology will locate exact or similar items across various stores in seconds. Whether it’s inspired by something you saw online, on social media, or in person, Drezily ensures that you find what you’re looking for, quickly and effortlessly.

It exposes, harnesses, institutionalizes, and activates that intelligence to optimize predictive brand experiences and drive revenue at scale. Brands know who purchased what, when, where, and how it happened but are no closer to understanding “why it happened.” We unlock and unleash differentiated, zero-party data to tell brands why customers do what they do. This intelligence is the holy grail - the new oil. We access it by activating hyperpersonal human relationships between brands and their most important customers. We fuse 1:1 engagement and immersive omnichannel e-commerce experiences with powerful behavioral and social science-based BLMs (brand language models) to build meaningful and lasting customer-brand relationships.  At its core, our business is about re-establishing the economic value of human connection by combining old-world values with new-world capabilities. Our proprietary BLMs deliver differentiated data built on trust, empathy, care, and anticipation. Through livestream video, voice, text, and chat, they capture the emotional and irrational behavior wrapped in the human experience. With these insights, our billion-person corner store promises to know what consumers want before they know it themselves.  Umego is more than technology. It’s a declaration of principles - that authentic human relationships trump synthetic ones to propel meaningful and sustainable business growth. It confirms a fundamental truth: ●	Customers want someone who cares about them.  ●	Brands want retention, loyalty, and advocacy.  Umego delivers both.
